Title: Relates to allowing for facility caregivers to possess medical marihuana in a similar manner to that of a designated caregiver
Summary: Relates to allowing for facility caregivers to possess medical marihuana in a similar manner to that of a designated caregiver; relates to medical marihuana research.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to allowing for facility caregivers to possess medical marihuana in a similar manner to that of a designated caregiver
